title:
Why is it law enforcement officers are paid so poorly in this area (NH Co & BC )

How can society rationalize paying refuse collectors more than our law enforcement officers?
text:
In effect, pay is set by comparing similar-sized cities. How can this
be rationalized? Good question, but it's not one that we can answer.
Here's a link, though, to your answer:
